channel.title: Help lagg how do i fix it!
channel.description:
look at this lag i dont know what it is but when more then 10 people get on this is what it says what can i do to fix it!!!
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000000 at stream.writeWord(stream.java:192) at client.addItem(client.java:11394) at client.fromBank(client.java:10314) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20487) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13963) at client.process(client.java:13933) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Server [fatal] - exception Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000001 at stream.createFrameVarSizeWord(stream.java:168) at client.sendFrame126(client.java:8459) at client.process(client.java:12559) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50)
what is this lag!!! [br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2007, 09:14:18 PM[/size][hr]please i beg u someone please help me its really annoying i cant fix it just someone tell me on my runserver it says that when more then 10 people get on please help me !! please im begging u!

item.title: Help lagg how do i fix it!
item.dc:creator: @Typh Typh
item.description:
@Typh wrote:

Umm, if its ur server, your gonna get lagged, unless ur comp is a super computer. Also, Blitz is right.

Read full topic

hmmm well i got that error when i clicked a button testing the autocast thing i tried to fix so someone probally click on someone or something or spawned something that caused it to glitch and give you that error i have no idea how to fix it,thats just my thought on whats happening to you

look at this lag i dont know what it is but when more then 10 people get on this is what it says what can i do to fix it!!!
